attributes.action: Provide sufficient funding for all elderly people in nursing homes to receive free Continuing Health Care as is their entitlement under the NHS.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The NHS, DoH and Social Services departments have worked together to ensure that old people in need of nursing care do not get free care, as is their entitlement under the NHS. Instead they have to sell their homes and pay for what younger people get free.
